trans-unit.source: Controls how a document is printed from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Określa, jak dokument jest drukowany w aplikacji formularzy systemu Windows.

trans-unit.source: This class implements a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> and adds a status dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Ta klasa implementuje <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>i dodaje okno dialogowe Stan.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>

trans-unit.source: A print controller specifies how a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is printed.
trans-unit.target: Kontroler wydruku określa sposób <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>jest drukowana.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the PrintControllerWithStatusDialog class, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać listę początkowe wartości właściwości dla wystąpienia klasy PrintControllerWithStatusDialog, zobacz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.%23ctor%2A>konstruktora.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji dotyczących drukowania w formularzach systemu Windows, zobacz <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Omówienie przestrzeni nazw.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: If you want to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli chcesz wydrukuj z aplikacji Windows Presentation Foundation, zobacz <xref:System.Printing>przestrzeni nazw.</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"></xref> class, wrapping the supplied <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"> </xref> klasy zawijania podane <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> to encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> celu hermetyzacji.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"></xref> class, wrapping the supplied <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> and specifying a title for the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"> </xref> klasy zawijania podane <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> i określając tytuł okna dialogowego.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> to encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> celu hermetyzacji.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing a title for the status dialog box.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>zawierający tytuł okna dialogowego Stan.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"></xref> is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość wskazującą, to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"> </xref> służy do podglądu wydruku.

trans-unit.source: The IsPreview checks the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.IsPreview%2A> property of the underlying controller.
trans-unit.target: Sprawdzanie IsPreview <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.IsPreview%2A>Właściwość podstawowy kontroler.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.IsPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"></xref> is used for print preview, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Jeśli <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"> </xref> służy do podglądu wydruku, w przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Kończy sekwencji kontrolki, która określa, kiedy i jak wydrukować strony z dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>Klasa wywołuje <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodę na hermetyzowany <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPage method is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoda OnEndPage jest wywoływana bezpośrednio po <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>zgłasza <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage is not called.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli wyjątek wewnątrz <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>zdarzenia <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, nie jest wywoływana metoda OnEndPage.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>Metoda tworzy <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiekt, który jest wysyłany do drukarki.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Po <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>jest wywoływana, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>zestawy metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiektu grafiki pojedynczej strony.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: (Użyj <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>można ustawić jak wydrukować stronę do dokumentu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.) OnEndPage clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: For example, można dostosować ustawienia strony osobno dla każdej strony.) Czyści OnEndPage <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiektu, gdy <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A>Metoda zwalnia obiektu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> reprezentujący aktualnie drukuje dokument.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> zawierający dane zdarzenia.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Kończy sekwencji kontrolki, która określa, kiedy i jak wydrukować dokument.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>Klasa wywołuje <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodę na hermetyzowany <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPrint method is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoda OnEndPrint jest wywoływana bezpośrednio po <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>zgłasza <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>Metoda tworzy <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiekt, który jest wysyłany do drukarki.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Po <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>jest wywoływana, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>zestawy metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiektu grafiki pojedynczej strony.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: (Użyj <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>ustalenie, kiedy i jak wydrukować dokument.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.) The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while OnEndPrint deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład można opóźnić drukowanie w ciągu 30 minut; Dostosuj ustawienia drukarki dla dokumentu) <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>Czyści metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiektu, gdy obiekt cofa alokację OnEndPrint.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> reprezentujący aktualnie drukuje dokument.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> zawierający dane zdarzenia.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Rozpoczyna się sekwencji kontrolki, która określa, kiedy i jak wydrukować strony z dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>Klasa wywołuje <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodę na hermetyzowany <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: The OnStartPage method is called immediately before the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoda OnStartPage jest wywoływana bezpośrednio przed <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>zgłasza <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>Metoda tworzy <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiekt, który jest wysyłany do drukarki.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, OnStartPage sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Po <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>po wywołaniu metody OnStartPage zestawy <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiektu grafiki pojedynczej strony.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>Czyści — metoda <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiektu, gdy <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A>Metoda zwalnia obiektu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use OnStartPage to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: Użyj metody OnStartPage, aby ustawić jak wydrukować stronę do dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład można dostosować ustawienia strony osobno dla każdej strony.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> reprezentujący aktualnie drukuje dokument.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> zawierający dane zdarzenia.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> obiekt, który reprezentuje strony z <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Rozpoczyna się sekwencji kontrolki, która określa, kiedy i jak wydrukować dokument.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>Klasa wywołuje <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodę na hermetyzowany <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: The OnStartPrint method is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoda OnStartPrint jest wywoływana bezpośrednio po <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>zgłasza <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Use OnStartPrint to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Umożliwia określenie, kiedy i jak wydrukować dokument OnStartPrint.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład można opóźnić drukowanie w ciągu 30 minut lub dostosować ustawienia drukarki dla dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy OnStartPrint <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiekt, który jest wysyłany do drukarki.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Po wywołaniu OnStartPrint <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>zestawy metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiektu grafiki pojedynczej strony.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>Czyści — metoda <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiektu, gdy <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A>Metoda zwalnia obiektu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is a good place to verify that <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> are valid.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint jest dobrym miejscem do sprawdzenia, czy <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>są prawidłowe.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> reprezentujący aktualnie drukuje dokument.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> zawierający dane zdarzenia.
